item.title: This 22-year-old college dropout is generating $700,000 a year from ‘AI slop’ videos that people sleep through
item.description: Gen Zer Adavia Davis dropped out of college after buying a Tesla Model 3 with Youtube money. His AI-generated videos now earn $60k a month

item.title: American Airlines pilot’s pay stub shows surprisingly ‘elite money,’ with $458,000 in year-to-date compensation
item.description: A viral post of a Miami-based American Airlines captain’s paycheck puts pilot compensation at the center of a broader debate.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg’s Meta is dropping over $2 billion for an AI startup—a rare example of a U.S. tech giant buying a platform founded in China
item.description: Silicon Valley's AI spending spree continues, but with a new geopolitical wrinkle.

item.title: Georgia’s ‘America First’ license plates, Washington’s $17 minimum wage and Hawaii’s climate change tourist tax: new laws are on the books
item.description: The first of the year brings a variety of new state laws, including some that appear to contain first-of-their-kind policies, programs or procedures.

item.title: The government paid $5 million instead of $50,000 to a Florida Democrat’s healthcare company. She claims innocence from fraud
item.description: According to the indictment, within two months of receiving the funds in 2021, more than $100,000 had been spent on a yellow diamond ring.
